column4: does any one know how i can share a file on linux on a windows network!  i can see the ubuntu server on my network neighborhood on my windows OS but i cant access it ! it keeps asking for a user name and password
and no account works for that
I hit enter too early, have a look at the message from ubotu
can u please tell me what i need to do to make my share viewable
no release in 2005 month 1 it was april or october :)
I don't do samba (yet, as I live on a totally linux network)  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SettingUpSamba has both server and client side samba solutions
you are using the version from october so the number is 5.10 :-) there is no 5.1 that would be january :)
anyway  this works or we would have people saying it was faulty every day https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SettingUpSamba << just go through the steps cutting and pasting one at a time
do u know how to copy a file from an ssh session to localhost?
there are two ways to do that sftp which works like ftp and scp which is secure copy http://www.openssh.com/faq.html is fairly useful
